Html:
Hi all,

If you create a project using Goblin XNA, and post your project in a website or youtube, please remember to credit us by mentioning that you have used Goblin XNA created by Ohan Oda at Columbia University for your project.

I see a few youtube videos that look like they've created using Goblin XNA, but there is no mention about it in their description. 

 

Thanks

Ohan
